participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, loves to bring people together through cooking.
participant_1.background: My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends. I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community. I own a computer that is suitable for my needs. i am twenty five years old. I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, values relationships with family and friends.
participant_2.background: I have a very close relationship with my family, and they are always there for me when I need them. My favorite websites are ones that teach me about new places to climb and share recipes for brownies. i like to eat hard boiled eggs. i work for the railroad. i can t live without my friends.

content.text: What's your favorite holiday?
Thanksgiving is my favorite holiday because of the food! I love to cook and Thanksgiving is the one day a year I get to cook for everyone I love.
That's great! I love to cook too. What's your favorite dish to make?
I love making my famous macaroni and cheese! It's a family recipe and everyone always raves about it.
That sounds amazing! I've never had macaroni and cheese before.
You're missing out! I'll have to make you some next time we hang out.
That would be awesome! Thank you!
No problem! What's your favorite website?
I love to read recipes on Pinterest. I'm always looking for new ways to cook.
Me too! I love Pinterest. I also love looking at pictures of cats.
Cats are awesome! I have two of them.
I love cats! I wish I could have one, but my landlord doesn't allow pets.
That's too bad. Cats are great companions.
They are! I'll have to get one when I have my own place.
Good idea! What do you do for work?
I work for the railroad. I'm a conductor.
That's cool! I've always wanted to ride on a train.
It's a lot of fun! I get to see a lot of different places.
That sounds great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I do. It's a good job.
Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, go hiking, and spend time with my friends and family
